actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to remove the 5 percent acreage limitation requirement on producers of the 1990 crop of oats and to require that the acreage base of such crop of oats be determined separate from that of barley, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 with respect to the 1990 oat crop to: (1) remove the five percent acreage limitation requirement; and (2) determine oat and barley acreage bases separately.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to remove the 5 percent acreage limitation requirement on producers of the 1990 crop of oats and to require that the acreage base of such crop of oats be determined separate from that of barley, and for other purposes.
